app_description: Install, manage and remove AppImage applications on Ubuntu

about_description: AppImage Manager helps you integrate AppImage applications with your Ubuntu system. It extracts the contents and creates system links rather than running AppImages as portable files.
about_feature_extract: • Extract AppImage contents for system integration
about_feature_desktop: • Create desktop entries and menu items
about_feature_launch: • Launch applications directly from the manager
An error occurred during application ini: An error occurred during application initialization: {0}
welcome_desc: Easily install, manage, and integrate AppImage applications with your system.
tip_select_appimage: Browse your files to select an AppImage file to install
tip_appimage_path: Shows the path to the selected AppImage file
tip_install_system: Install for all users (requires administrator privileges)
tip_install_user: Install only for your user account (recommended)
tip_custom_path: Specify the directory where you want to install the AppImage
tip_browse: Browse for a custom installation directory
tip_install: Start the installation process for the selected AppImage
tip_cancel: Clear the form and cancel the installation process
tip_search: Filter the list of installed applications
tip_sort: Sort the list of installed applications
tip_refresh: Refresh the list of installed applications

err_db_post_install: Installation completed, but database error occurred.

confirm_uninstall_msg: Are you sure you want to uninstall '{app_name}'?
confirm_uninstall_missing_msg: The files for '{app_name}' seem to be missing. Remove the database entry anyway?

error_find_corrupt_remove: Could not find the database entry to remove.

cannot_run_missing_msg: This application is missing its files and cannot be run.
leftover_dialog_msg: The following files/directories might be leftovers from the uninstalled application. Please review carefully and select the ones you want to remove:
leftover_error_msg: Failed to remove some or all selected leftover items. Check logs.
leftover_check_error_msg: An error occurred while checking for leftover files.
uninstall_success_leftover_failed: '{app_name}' has been successfully uninstalled (leftover check failed).
